metadata.titleEn: Organic matter data from Wulungu Lake in Xinjiang over the past 8000 years
metadata.titleCn: 新疆乌伦古湖过去8000年来的有机质数据
metadata.description: This dataset includes organic matter data of Wulungu Lake in Xinjiang. The area is a closed terminal lake, fed mainly by meltwater from snow and ice, and today the climate in the area is dominated by westerlies. The collected lake core was divided into samples at 1 cm spacing, freeze-dried and sampled, and tested by Muffle furnace. Take cleaning, drying crucible weighing; Weigh the sample and place it in the crucible. Record the total weight of the sample and crucible. The sample is placed in the Muffle furnace, heated to 550℃ and kept for 2 hours, and the crucible is taken out and cooled in the dryer after cooling to the appropriate temperature. After reaching the constant weight, the percentage of the weight of the burned part to the dry weight of the sample is the burned loss. The burning vector was converted to organic matter content by linear formula. With the superposition of centennial scale changes, the water vapor content has gradually increased since 8000 cal BP. 8000 ~ 5350 cal yr BP forms a permanent lake, the surface of which gradually rises. The humidity increases rapidly between 5350 and 500 cal yr BP, with the wettest climate occurring between 3200 and 500 cal yr BP. After 500 cal yr BP, the lake level drops. The trend of increasing humidity in Holocene indicates that the winter precipitation in northern Xinjiang was on the rise during Holocene.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包括新疆乌伦古湖有机质数据。该地区是一个封闭的终端湖泊，主要由冰雪融水提供水源，如今该地区的气候主要为西风带。将采集的湖泊岩芯按照1 cm间距分样，冷冻干燥之后取样，使用马弗炉进行测试。取清洗、烘干坩埚称重；称取样品置于坩埚中，记录样品和坩埚总重。将样品置于马弗炉内，加热至550℃保持2小时，降温至合适温度后将坩埚取出并放入干燥器中冷却，达到恒重后称重烧失部分的重量占样品干重百分比即为烧失量。利用线性公式将烧矢量转化为有机质含量。在8000 cal年BP以来，随着百年尺度变化的叠加，水汽含量逐渐增加。8000 ~ 5350 cal yr BP形成了一个永久性湖泊，湖面逐渐上升。在5350 ~ 500 cal yr BP期间，湿度状况迅速增加，最湿气候发生在3200 ~ 500 cal yr BP之间。500 cal yr BP之后，湖面下降。全新世湿度增加的趋势表明，全新世期间北疆冬季降水呈上升趋势。

literatureList.titleEn: Moisture evolution in North Xinjiang (northwest China) during the last 8000 years linked to the westerlies’ winter half-year precipitation
literatureList.referenceEn: Zhang, X., Zhou, A., Huang, Z., An, C., Zhao, Y., Yin, L., & Russell, J. M. (2020). Moisture evolution in North Xinjiang (northwest China) during the last 8000 years linked to the westerlies’ winter half-year precipitation. Quaternary Research, 100, 122–134. doi:10.1017/qua.2020.94

background: Winter half-year precipitation dominates variations in hydroclimatic conditions in North Xinjiang, but few researchers have focused on this very important aspect of the Holocene climate. The site is a closed terminal lake fed mainly by meltwater from snow and ice, and today the area is climatically dominated by the westerlies.
research objective: Here we report multiproxy evidence of Holocene hydroclimate changes from the sediments of Wulungu Lake in North Xinjiang.
challenges: The dating of bulk organic matter (BOM) may be influenced by the reservoir effect and result in old radiocarbon ages of samples.
methods: In September 2010, two parallel sediment cores were recovered from the northeast part of Wulungu Lake (47° 21′ 50.50′′ N, 87°27′ 7.20′′E), in a water depth of 15.47 m, using a custom-built piston corer on a UWITEC platform. The first section was 280 cm in sediment depth and was collected using a self-made piston that was assembled with two rubber plugs (each measuring 60 mm in diameter), four steel plates (each measuring 58 mm in diameter), and a steel pin. The second section was 132 cm in sediment depth and was collected using a UWITEC 60-mm piston. Both sections of core WLG10B were split into two halves: one half was used for X-ray fluorescence (XRF) scanning, and the other half was subsampled at 1-cm intervals and freeze-dried for further investigation. The intact half-core was carefully flattened and then imaged with a line scan camera on an Avaatech XRF core scanner with a resolution of 140 ppcm (350 dpi); it was then covered with Ultralene plastic film (4μm) and analyzed again using the same core scanner. The total organic matter (TOM) content was determined using weight loss-on-ignition measurements at 1-cm intervals. Three samples from different lithological facies and samples from the lakeshore and the Wulungu River were used for X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis using a PANalytical X’Pert Pro MPD. For grain-size analysis, the sediments were subsampled at 1-cm intervals and pretreated with 10% H2O2 to remove organic matter and then with 10% HCl to remove carbonates. Finally, the samples were rinsed with deionized water and dispersed with 10 ml of 0.05 mol/L (NaPO3)6 on an ultrasonic vibrator for 10 mins. Grain-size distributions (GSDs) between 0.02 μm and 2000 μm were measured using a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser grain-size analyzer and assigned to 100 size classes.
findings: Grain-size end-member analysis implies an important mode of variation that indicates a gradually increasing moisture trend, with superimposed centennial-scale variations, since 8000 cal yr BP. From 8000 to 5350 cal yr BP, a permanent lake developed, and the lake level gradually rose. Between 5350 and 500 cal yr BP, the moisture status increased rapidly, with the wettest climate occurring between 3200 and 500 cal yr BP. After 500 cal yr BP, the lake level fell. The trend of increasing Holocene wetness indicates a rising winter precipitation in North Xinjiang during the Holocene. This was due to an increase in upwind vapor concentrations caused by increased evaporation and strength of the westerlies, which were determined by the increasing boreal winter insolation and its latitudinal gradient.
backgroundCn: 冬季半年降水主导了北新疆水文气候条件的变化，但很少有研究者关注这一在全新世气候中非常重要的方面。该地点是一个封闭的终端湖，主要由雪和冰融水供给，而如今该地区的气候主要受西风带的影响。
research objectiveCn: 我们在此报告来自新疆北部乌伦古湖沉积物的全新世水文气候变化的多重代理证据。
challengesCn: 大宗有机物（BOM）的测年可能受到水库效应的影响，从而导致样本的放射性碳年龄偏老。
methodsCn: 2010年9月，从乌伦古湖东北部（47° 21′ 50.50′′ N，87°27′ 7.20′′E）水深15.47米处回收了两个平行的沉积物核心，使用定制的活塞取芯器在UWITEC平台上进行采集。第一段沉积物深度为280厘米，使用自制活塞采集，该活塞由两个直径为60毫米的橡胶塞、四个直径为58毫米的钢板和一个钢销组装而成。第二段沉积物深度为132厘米，使用UWITEC 60毫米活塞进行采集。核心WLG10B的两个部分被分成两半：一半用于X射线荧光（XRF）扫描，另一半以1厘米间隔进行取样并冷冻干燥以供进一步研究。完整的半核心被小心地平整，然后使用Avaatech XRF核心扫描仪以140 ppcm（350 dpi）的分辨率成像，随后用4μm的Ultralene塑料薄膜覆盖，并再次使用同一核心扫描仪进行分析。总有机物（TOM）含量通过在1厘米间隔处进行失重法测定。来自不同岩石相的三个样本以及湖岸和乌伦古河的样本用于使用PANalytical X’Pert Pro MPD进行X射线衍射（XRD）分析。对于粒度分析，沉积物在1厘米间隔处进行取样，预处理时使用10%的H2O2去除有机物，然后使用10%的HCl去除碳酸盐。最后，样本用去离子水冲洗，并用10毫升0.05 mol/L的（NaPO3）6在超声振动器上分散10分钟。粒度分布（GSD）在0.02微米到2000微米之间使用Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度分析仪进行测量，并分配到100个粒度级别。
findingsCn: 粒度端元分析暗示了一种重要的变化模式，表明自公元前8000年以来，湿度趋势逐渐增加，并叠加了百年尺度的变化。从公元前8000年到公元前5350年，形成了一个永久性湖泊，湖水位逐渐上升。在公元前5350年到公元前500年之间，湿度状态迅速增加，公元前3200年到公元前500年之间气候最为湿润。公元前500年后，湖水位下降。全新世湿润度逐渐增加的趋势表明，在全新世期间，北新疆的冬季降水量上升。这是由于上游水汽浓度的增加，导致蒸发和西风带强度增强，这一变化由北半球冬季日照的增加及其纬度梯度决定。

Verification.QuestionEn: Can the process of using weight loss-on-ignition measurements at 1-cm intervals accurately determine the total organic matter content in sediment cores?
Verification.QuestionCn: 使用1厘米间隔的失重点燃测量法是否能准确确定沉积物核心中的总有机物含量？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the linear formula used to convert burn vector to organic matter content a reliable method in this field?
Verification.QuestionCn: 将燃烧向量转换为有机物含量的线性公式在该领域是一种可靠的方法吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the determination of organic matter content in sediment cores more accurately achieved using loss-on-ignition measurements, XRF scanning, or XRD analysis?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在沉积物核心中有机物含量的测定是通过失重法测量、XRF扫描还是XRD分析更准确？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: When collecting sediment cores for hydroclimate analysis, is it more effective to use a custom-built piston corer, a UWITEC platform, or another coring approach?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在进行水文气候分析时，收集沉积物核心时使用定制的活塞取芯器、UWITEC平台或其他取芯方法，哪种方法更有效？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: custom-built piston corer on a UWITEC platform
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 定制建造的活塞取样器安装在UWITEC平台上。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the common methods used for determining the total organic matter in lake sediment cores?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 确定湖泊沉积物核心中总有机物质的常用方法有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with dating bulk organic matter in sediment cores?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 与沉积物核心中大宗有机物的约会相关的挑战有哪些？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to analyze organic matter content in lake sediment cores?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一种用于分析湖泊沉积物核心中有机物质含量的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: One example of a data collection method for analyzing organic matter content in lake sediment cores involves subsampling the cores at 1-cm intervals, freeze-drying the samples, and then conducting weight loss-on-ignition measurements to determine the total organic matter content.
Example.AnswerCn: 分析湖泊沉积物核心中有机物含量的一种数据收集方法是以1厘米的间隔对核心进行亚样本采集，冷冻干燥样品，然后进行失重点火测量以确定总有机物含量。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered when dating bulk organic matter in sediment cores?
Example.QuestionCn: 在沉积物核心中对大宗有机物进行年代测定时遇到的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge encountered when dating bulk organic matter in sediment cores is the reservoir effect, which can influence the radiocarbon ages of the samples, potentially resulting in older apparent ages.
Example.AnswerCn: 在沉积物核心中对大宗有机物进行约会时遇到的一个挑战是水库效应，这可能会影响样本的放射性碳年龄，从而导致表观年龄偏大。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific methods used for organic matter content determination in lake sediment cores?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 湖泊沉积物核心中有机质含量测定的具体方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 550°C, two hours, weight loss as a percentage of the dry sample weight
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 550°C，两个小时，重量损失占干样品重量的百分比

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with dating sediment cores in closed terminal lakes?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与封闭终端湖泊的沉积物核心约会相关的挑战是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 水库效应，较老的放射性碳年代

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the grain-size analysis process in lake sediments?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 湖泊沉积物的粒度分析过程的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: subsampling at 1-cm intervals, pretreatment with 10% H2O2, pretreatment with 10% HCl, rinsing with deionized water, dispersion with sodium hexametaphosphate, ultrasonic vibration, laser grain-size analysis, grain-size distribution measurement between 0.02 μm and 2000 μm
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 以1厘米间隔进行子采样，使用10%过氧化氢进行预处理，使用10%盐酸进行预处理，用去离子水冲洗，使用六偏磷酸钠进行分散，超声波振动，激光粒度分析，测量粒度分布范围为0.02微米至2000微米。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many sediment cores were recovered from the data collection site in North Xinjiang?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在北新疆的数据采集地点共回收了多少个沉积物核心？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the resolution of the line scan camera used for imaging the sediment cores?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于成像沉积物核心的线扫描相机的分辨率是多少？
Quantification.AnswerEn: 140 pixels per centimeter, 350 dots per inch
Quantification.AnswerCn: 140 像素每厘米，350 点每英寸

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many size classes were assigned to the grain-size distributions measured in the sediment analysis?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在沉积物分析中，对测量的粒度分布分配了多少个粒径级别？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'weight loss-on-ignition' mean in the context of organic matter content determination?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在有机物含量测定的背景下，“灼烧失重”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Weight loss-on-ignition is a method used to determine the total organic matter content in sediment samples. It involves subjecting the sample to high temperatures in a muffle furnace, where it is heated to 550°C for 2 hours. The percentage of the weight lost during this process, relative to the dry weight of the sample, is calculated to estimate the organic matter content.
Definition.AnswerCn: 失重法是一种用于测定沉积物样品中总有机物含量的方法。该方法涉及将样品置于马弗炉中，在550°C的高温下加热2小时。在此过程中，计算相对于样品干重的失重百分比，以估算有机物含量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the 'reservoir effect' in the context of radiocarbon dating bulk organic matter?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在放射性碳测定散装有机物时，“库效应”是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The reservoir effect in radiocarbon dating refers to the potential for bulk organic matter dating to be influenced by older carbon sources, which can result in dated samples appearing older than they actually are. This occurs when organic material from sources such as sediments, which may contain 'old' carbon, is incorporated into the sample being dated.
Definition.AnswerCn: 放射性碳定年中的水库效应指的是大宗有机物定年可能受到较老碳源的影响，从而导致被测样本的日期看起来比实际年龄更老。这种情况发生在有机材料来自于如沉积物等可能含有“老”碳的来源，并被纳入到待测样本中。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods used in the organic matter study of Wulungu Lake compare to other common methodologies for lake sediment analysis?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在Wulungu湖有机物质研究中使用的数据收集方法与其他常见的湖泊沉积物分析方法相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data collection methods for Wulungu Lake involved using piston corers to recover sediment cores, subsampling at 1-cm intervals, and performing X-ray fluorescence scanning, which are fairly standard in lake sediment analysis. Other methodologies might use different coring techniques, intervals, or additional analyses like carbon dating or isotopic studies to complement organic matter analysis.
Comparison.AnswerCn: Wulungu湖的数据收集方法包括使用活塞取芯器回收沉积物核心，以1厘米的间隔进行亚样本采集，并进行X射线荧光扫描，这在湖泊沉积物分析中是相当标准的。其他方法可能使用不同的取芯技术、间隔或额外的分析，如碳测年或同位素研究，以补充有机物分析。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the potential inaccuracies in the dating of bulk organic matter (BOM) in sediment cores, and how might these factors affect the overall data collection process?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响沉积物核心中大宗有机物（BOM）定年的潜在不准确性的因素有哪些，这些因素又可能如何影响整体数据收集过程？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The dating of bulk organic matter (BOM) may be influenced by the reservoir effect, which can result in old radiocarbon ages of samples. This potential inaccuracy can affect the overall data collection process by introducing errors in the chronological framework, impacting the interpretation of hydroclimatic changes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 大宗有机物（BOM）的测年可能受到水库效应的影响，这可能导致样本的放射性碳年龄偏老。这种潜在的不准确性可能会影响整体数据收集过程，通过引入时间框架中的错误，影响对水文气候变化的解读。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the trend of increasing Holocene wetness in North Xinjiang, and how does it relate to the data collected from sediment cores?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致北新疆全新世湿润趋势的原因是什么？它与从沉积物核心收集的数据有什么关系？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The trend of increasing Holocene wetness in North Xinjiang is caused by a rise in winter precipitation due to increased upwind vapor concentrations and strength of the westerlies, influenced by boreal winter insolation and its latitudinal gradient. This trend is inferred from grain-size end-member analysis of sediment cores, which indicates a gradually increasing moisture trend since 8000 cal yr BP.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 北新疆的全新世湿润趋势是由于冬季降水量的增加，这与上游水汽浓度的上升和西风带的增强有关，这些因素受到北半球冬季日照和其纬度梯度的影响。这个趋势是通过对沉积物核心的粒度端元分析推断出来的，表明自公元前8000年起，湿润程度逐渐增加。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the dating reservoir effect influence the interpretation of hydroclimate trends derived from organic matter in lake sediments?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 约会水库效应如何影响从湖泊沉积物中衍生的水文气候趋势的解释？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The dating reservoir effect can lead to older radiocarbon ages of organic matter samples, potentially skewing the interpretation of hydroclimate trends and requiring careful calibration to ensure accurate chronological frameworks.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 约会水库效应可能导致有机物样本的放射性碳年龄偏大，从而可能扭曲对水文气候趋势的解读，并需要仔细校准以确保准确的时间框架。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective behind collecting organic matter data from sediment cores in closed terminal lakes in North Xinjiang?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在新疆北部封闭终端湖泊中收集沉积物核心有机物数据的主要目的是为了什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to report multiproxy evidence of Holocene hydroclimate changes, focusing on understanding variations in hydroclimatic conditions dominated by winter half-year precipitation, which are crucial for interpreting the climatic history of the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是报告全新世水文气候变化的多重代理证据，重点理解以冬季半年降水为主导的水文气候条件的变化，这对于解读该地区的气候历史至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to address challenges such as the reservoir effect when dating bulk organic matter in sediment cores?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在对沉积物核心中的大宗有机物进行年代测定时，解决诸如水库效应等挑战是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Addressing challenges like the reservoir effect is important because it can influence the dating accuracy, potentially leading to old radiocarbon ages, which could misrepresent the timeline of climatic events and hinder the correct interpretation of historical hydroclimatic changes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 解决水库效应等挑战非常重要，因为它会影响测年准确性，可能导致放射性碳年龄偏老，从而错误地表示气候事件的时间线，并妨碍对历史水文气候变化的正确解读。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedural steps involved in using a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser grain-size analyzer to measure grain-size distributions in sediment samples?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度分析仪测量沉积物样品的粒度分布所涉及的程序步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedural steps involve subsampling sediments at 1-cm intervals, pretreating the samples with 10% H2O2 to remove organic matter, and 10% HCl to remove carbonates. The samples are then rinsed with deionized water and dispersed with 10 ml of 0.05 mol/L (NaPO3)6 on an ultrasonic vibrator for 10 minutes. Grain-size distributions are measured using a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser grain-size analyzer, which assigns the sediment to 100 size classes.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 程序步骤包括以1厘米间隔对沉积物进行亚样品采集，使用10%的H2O2预处理样品以去除有机物，再用10%的HCl去除碳酸盐。然后用去离子水冲洗样品，并用10毫升0.05 mol/L的(NaPO3)6在超声振动器上分散10分钟。使用Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度分析仪测量粒度分布，该仪器将沉积物分配到100个粒度级别。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the weight loss-on-ignition method applied to determine the total organic matter content in lake sediment samples?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 重量损失法用于确定湖泊沉积物样品中有机物总含量的应用是怎样的？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The weight loss-on-ignition method involves collecting sediment cores and splitting them into halves. One half is subsampled at 1-cm intervals and freeze-dried. The sample is then weighed before and after being placed in a muffle furnace at 550°C for 2 hours. The weight loss is calculated as a percentage of the dry weight to determine the total organic matter content.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 失重法涉及收集沉积物核心并将其分成两半。一半按1厘米间隔进行亚样本采集并进行冷冻干燥。样品在放入550°C的马弗炉中加热2小时之前和之后进行称重。失重作为干重的百分比计算，以确定总有机物含量。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What specific procedures are followed for X-ray fluorescence (XRF) scanning of sediment cores to analyze their composition?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 沉积物岩心的X射线荧光（XRF）扫描分析其成分时遵循的具体程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: For X-ray fluorescence (XRF) scanning, sediment cores are first split into two halves. The intact half-core is carefully flattened and imaged with a line scan camera on an Avaatech XRF core scanner with a resolution of 140 ppcm (350 dpi). It is then covered with Ultralene plastic film (4μm) and analyzed again using the same core scanner to determine the composition.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 对于X射线荧光（XRF）扫描，沉积物岩心首先被分成两半。完整的半岩心被小心地压平，并使用Avaatech XRF岩心扫描仪上的线扫描相机以140 ppcm（350 dpi）的分辨率进行成像。然后用4μm的Ultralene塑料薄膜覆盖，并再次使用相同的岩心扫描仪进行分析，以确定成分。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why would some data collection methods potentially result in unexpected dating inaccuracies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 某些数据收集方法可能导致意外的日期不准确性的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The dating of bulk organic matter (BOM) in the dataset may be influenced by the reservoir effect, which can lead to unexpectedly old radiocarbon ages of samples, thus introducing potential inaccuracies in dating.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在数据集中，散装有机物（BOM）的测年可能受到水库效应的影响，这可能导致样本的放射性碳年龄意外偏老，从而引入测年上的潜在不准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using a custom-built piston corer and a UWITEC platform for sediment core recovery in hydrological studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用定制的活塞取样器和UWITEC平台在水文研究中进行沉积物核心采集的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using a custom-built piston corer and a UWITEC platform appears effective for sediment core recovery, given the successful extraction of cores from Wulungu Lake at specific depths. The method provided detailed samples for multiproxy analysis, proving useful in interpreting historical hydroclimate changes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用定制的活塞取芯器和UWITEC平台似乎对沉积物核心的回收有效，因为成功从乌伦古湖提取了特定深度的核心。该方法提供了详细的样本用于多代理分析，对于解释历史水文气候变化非常有用。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your opinion on the challenges associated with the reservoir effect influencing the dating of bulk organic matter in paleoclimate studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对影响古气候研究中大宗有机物定年挑战的水库效应的看法是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The reservoir effect poses significant challenges in dating bulk organic matter, potentially leading to inaccuracies in radiocarbon dating due to older apparent ages. Researchers need to consider this effect when interpreting chronological data to ensure reliable results.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 水库效应在对大宗有机物进行测年时带来了重大挑战，可能导致放射性碳测年出现较老的表观年龄，从而造成不准确。研究人员在解释年代数据时需要考虑这一效应，以确保结果的可靠性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you assess the potential of grain-size end-member analysis in revealing historical moisture trends in terminal lake environments?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估粒度端元分析在揭示终端湖环境历史湿度趋势中的潜力？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Grain-size end-member analysis is a valuable tool for identifying historical moisture trends in terminal lake environments. It effectively highlighted a gradually increasing moisture trend with centennial-scale variations in the Wulungu Lake study, offering insights into past climate conditions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 粒度端元分析是识别终端湖环境历史湿度趋势的有价值工具。它有效地突显了乌伦古湖研究中逐渐增加的湿度趋势以及百年尺度的变化，为了解过去的气候条件提供了见解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the technique of using a custom-built piston corer contributes to the accuracy and reliability of sediment core collection for climate study.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白使用定制的活塞取芯器的技术如何提高气候研究中沉积物核心采集的准确性和可靠性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The use of a custom-built piston corer allows for precise collection of sediment cores, minimizing disturbances and ensuring the integrity of the samples. This is crucial for accurately analyzing the sediment layers and obtaining reliable data about historical climate conditions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 使用定制的活塞取样器可以精确收集沉积物核心，最小化扰动并确保样本的完整性。这对于准确分析沉积层和获取关于历史气候条件的可靠数据至关重要。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the challenges involved in dating sediment samples in Holocene climate studies.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 在全新世气候研究中，约会沉积样本面临的挑战包括：
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: One challenge in dating sediment samples is the influence of the reservoir effect on the dating of bulk organic matter (BOM), which can result in older radiocarbon ages for samples, complicating the accurate reconstruction of past climatic conditions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在对沉积物样本进行年代测定时，一个挑战是水库效应对散装有机物（BOM）年代测定的影响，这可能导致样本的放射性碳年龄偏大，从而使准确重建过去气候条件变得复杂。
